basics.name: Gasmi Aboubakr
basics.label: Software Solutions Architect
basics.summary: Aboubakr is a self-taught passionate developer and architect, he loves creation, innovation, system architectures & automation, he also enjoys all precious moments with his family and friends

work.summary: Emploitic is a multinational company based in Algiers (Algeria) and is present in 5 countries by January 2020. mainly providing HR solutions and is owner of emploitic.com, novojob.com, talenteo.com & kherdja.com websites.
highlights: Designing/Architecturing the future REST/gRPC API services for our Jobboard/ATS platforms, emploitic.com, novojob.com & talenteo.com using OpenAPI v3 format
Leading & coordinating the move to containerized development & production environements (Docker/Swarm/Kubernetes).
Designed and Configuring a three node (Master/Node) Docker Swarm cluster for development (az-01), backed with GlusterFS volumes as persistent storage for distributed applications

Implented/Deployed a multi-tier CI platform, using Gitlab in premise, Gitlab runners, Traefik as reverse proxy on a 3 node Swarm cluster, CoreDNS as dynamic DNS and wildcard letsencrypt generated certificates

Designed and refactored DevOps multi-project/multi-branching automated CI platform/pipeline to ease the deployment of new projects with little to no effort, a simple fork leading to an automated deployment with unique DNS hostname (valid SSL) and namespace with zero configuration
Designed a 4 trier internal mailing microservices that auto-handles bounce messages in real-time (Barid/Bouncestash/Bouncebeat).

Implemented and deployed Barid, a golang multi-domain/multi-queue message queueing & sending service for mass mailing, with server/worker tier (same binary), queue (rabbitmq) tier and Bouncestash tier for bounce mail addresses query & filtering, communicates using gRPC protocol and Protobuf message encoding secured with x509 certificate authentication, client libraries are autmatically generated for these languages: PHP/Golang/Ruby/Python

Implemented Bouncestash for bounce email addresses collection/querying and Bouncebeat, a CLI real-time multi-source (IMAP/POP/SMTP log) bounce emails parser & and extractor that sends to Bouncestash server. Written in Golang
Deployment of a 2 tier platform, Minio, an AWS S3 compatible tool and Nginx to support static website deployment and hosting for our documentation and built artifacts hosting

Directed the implementation of fully automated static documentation generation tools using mkdocs/docker and Gitlab template pipelines, a single import of a gitlab-ci.yml task definition triggers the build and deployment of a beautiful static documentation hosted on the in-prem docker cluster
Configured a Golang mirror to speedup golang projects builds.
Deployed CI monitoring tools & allerting tools stack (Docker swarm): Grafana, cadvisor, prometheus, dockerd-exporter, node-exporter, alertmanager and unsee
Implement/Maintain docker images to use in CI projects build stages: php/composer, golang, protobuf, grpc, mkdocs, html-tools (html/markdown validation tool) ...
Prepare the migration of some existing PHP services to Golang.
Prepare the guidelines and lead the introduction and application of DevOps practices in the development processeses (Documentation/Training Sessions)

Implemeted the fully blue/greep automated production/staging deployment of our CMS on emploitic.com, novojob.com & talenteo.com using an Rsync wrapper script entirely written in bash that handles deployment cache to speedup the process (rsync delta sync to a stage folder) and dynamic configuration templates
Design and implementation of a two tier Talenteo REST API v2 using DDD patterns. Written in PHP/Symfony with OpenAPI 2 definition and MySQL as a database engine
Leading the migration of our Java based functional tests to Ruby, using cucumber.

Launched an internal CLI app `Emploitic Development Kit` (edk) with support for exentions written in python that contains a set of tools to enhance and quick-bootstrap developers environement and helps in everyday's tasks
Prepared & Lead the migration of our product's front-end to a single page application using React/Vue frameworks
Preparation/Design & Leading the switch of some of our products backend to microservices (messaging, and user log services) backed with Xapian as storage and indexation engine
Leading the integration and automation of our ElasticStack platform deployment and configuration
Code reviews.
Manage and prioritize Front-End tasks and stories.

Initiated 3 internal Ruby gem modules projects, `selenium-dependencies`, `tests-runner`, `rake-utils` roviding an enhanced developer experience allowing the use of our functional tests written in (Java/Maven/Cucumber) on the CI and developer machines with neerly identical environments with zero configuration
Designed the architecture and configuration of the company's CI platform for our products, with Gitlab (on-premises) as platform
Configured/Installed the entire CI platform (CoreOs/Ubuntu) machines
Installed & Configured Gitlab to replace redmine as our source version control and CI platform
Migrated the entire multi-branch deployment pipeline to use in-premise Gitlab/Gitlab-runner with Shell and Docker runners
Configured a bower, npm, ruby gem, maven mirrors and caches to speedup build deployments
Contributed/Installed a Docker based DNS service written in python to automatically and dynamically register branches DNS hosts in the internal entreprise network
Introduced/Deployed mailcatcher for mailing testing and review to mitigate the risk of leaked tests email messages during tests
Development of a SPA multi-CV editing application using EmberJS, with a custom simplified Data layer (before Ember-Data v1 was released).
Implemented our in-house multi-branch website deployment using Git Hooks and bash scripts with an automatically updated listing page providing quick access to branch's deployment URL
Facebook single page job searching application using jquery, api backed by php.
Initiated the company's internal JavaScript library project Elib-Core.
Initiated and contributed to the internal HTML components (widgets) project on top of the internal library Elib-Core.
Introduced assets and product build atomation tools to the company.

work.summary: Software Development and Consulting company based in Algiers
Software Development and Consulting company based in Algiers
GMS was the exclusive representant of Mercedes-Benz in Algeria, since 2010, it also represent various chinese and american cars brands like Dodge, Jeep, Chrysler and GreatWall..
highlights: Budget Management.
Development of the company's Sales Management System Using ExtJS.
Installation & configuration of multiple Windows AD Servers hosted on HyperV.
Automated user profile registering and configuration within Active Directory using a portal registration page and Powershell script to apply and configure GPO permissions and setup
User assistance & PC's maintenance.
Network troubleshooting and maintenance.

awards.title: AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate (SAA-C01)
awards.summary: The AWS Certified Solutions Architect ‚Äì Associate exam is intended for individuals with experience designing distributed applications and systems on the AWS platform.

publications.name: Talk slides about EmberJS in Algiers Tech Meetup
